docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Aug. 15. -- A serious impasse has arisen in the Chaco peace conference over the exchange and repatriation of war prisoners. Paraguay is willing to exchange prisoners, grade for grade and man for man. Bolivia, however, insists upon the...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Aug. 15. -- A serious impasse has arisen in the Chaco peace conference over the exchange and repatriation of war prisoners. Paraguay is willing to exchange prisoners, grade for grade and man for man. Bolivia, however, insists upon the immediate release of all prisoners on the ground that the war has terminated.
docs.abstract: negotiations for exch and repatriation of prisoners

headline.main: PRISONERS' STATUS BALKS CHACO PEACE; Paraguay Would Exchange Man for Man, but Bolivia Insists All Be Freed.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Aug. 21. -- The Bolivian Government has informed diplomats at La Paz that it will suspend demobilization if Paraguay does not accept the peace terms proposed by the Bolivian delegation to the Chaco Peace Conference here.
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Aug. 21. -- The Bolivian Government has informed diplomats at La Paz that it will suspend demobilization if Paraguay does not accept the peace terms proposed by the Bolivian delegation to the Chaco Peace Conference here.
docs.abstract: Bolivia threatens to suspend demobilization if terms are not met

headline.main: BOLIVIA THREATENS TO RETAIN ARMIES; Warns Demobilizing of Force Will Be Halted if Peace Terms Are Not Met.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Aug. 22. -- There is a strong probability that a new republic will be formed in South America as a result of the Chaco war. It would be formed of the Bolivian Provinces of Beni and Santa Cruz and probably be called the Republic of Santa...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Aug. 22. -- There is a strong probability that a new republic will be formed in South America as a result of the Chaco war. It would be formed of the Bolivian Provinces of Beni and Santa Cruz and probably be called the Republic of Santa Cruz.
docs.abstract: Paraguay plans to aid formation of Republic of Santa Cruz, composed of 2 Bolivian provinces and ranking 7th on continent, as result of Chaco war; map

headline.main: Forming of New Nation Foreseen As an Outcome of the Chaco War; Paraguay's Plan for Independent Republic of Santa Cruz, Composed of Two Bolivian Provinces, Is Studied in Buenos Aires -- Country's Area Would Rank Seventh on Continent.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Aug. 23. -- The Chaco Peace Conference has ceased to function without ever having really started on its mission. The American delegate, Hugh Gibson, has returned to his post as Ambassador to Brazil and two Bolivian delegates, Bautista...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, Aug. 23. -- The Chaco Peace Conference has ceased to function without ever having really started on its mission. The American delegate, Hugh Gibson, has returned to his post as Ambassador to Brazil and two Bolivian delegates, Bautista Saavedra and Juan Maria Zalles, have abandoned their delegation and returned to La Paz to lead the political opposition against President Tejada Sorzano.

headline.main: CHACO PEACE MOVE IS FACING COLLAPSE; Intransigence of Paraguay and Bolivia Brings About Conference Suspension. CLAIMS NOT EXCHANGED

byline.original: By JOHN W. WHITE.Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES
